entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except west 60 gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:16 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except west 60 gusting to 80 near Juan de Fuca Strait early this evening.
